sentences.english: According to analysis by industry, polyester-cotton yarn Card camouflage cloth sales prospects.
sentences.chinese: 据业人士分析，涤棉纱卡迷彩布销售前景乐观。

sentences.english: Soldiers in camouflage banged on the door, then shot at it, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，穿着迷彩服的士兵大声捶门，然后朝门开枪。

sentences.english: The black graphic camouflages will camouflage the chest area.
sentences.chinese: 而黑色迷彩图案则可以修饰胸部。

sentences.english: I've seen the uniform change from olive drab to camouflage (retired before getting the scatter pattern).
sentences.chinese: 见过从橄榄色到迷彩服等一些列军装。
英国陆军多地形迷彩图案。

sentences.english: The pattern is inspired by the camouflage colors commonly worn by blue-collared workers in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 图案设计灵感源自于北京好多蓝领工人常穿的迷彩色。

sentences.english: Soldiers in fatigues loitered by the vehicles or slept inside.
sentences.chinese: 身穿迷彩服的士兵或在车内徘徊，或在里面睡觉。

sentences.english: New and classic camo prints look rugged on urban streets.
sentences.chinese: 新款和经典的迷彩印花在都市街道上显得粗犷硬朗。

sentences.english: Troops with camouflage face paint marching single file.
sentences.chinese: 面涂迷彩漆的军队呈单行队列行进。

sentences.english: Some of them even wore them with their camouflage combat smocks .
sentences.chinese: 有些人还穿着迷彩服佩带勋章。

sentences.english: Teams of paramilitaries in camouflage gear search through cars and stop lorries.
sentences.chinese: 身着迷彩服的准军事小组搜索车辆，并阻拦货车。

sentences.english: The pallet will travel by conveyor belt and be robot placed into one of the CAMO index carousel nests.
sentences.chinese: 托盘将前往输送带和迷彩指数传送带巢放置机器人。

sentences.english: Flip-flop features a TPU strap with dinosaur camo print.
sentences.chinese: 触发器功能与恐龙迷彩打印TPU肩带。

sentences.english: The sleeves of his camouflage shirt are cut off and his combat boots are untied.
sentences.chinese: 迷彩服的袖子被剪掉了，战斗靴也解开了。

sentences.english: In urban camouflages , man becomes invisible.
sentences.chinese: 在城市迷彩中，人变得隐形。

sentences.english: Lee, 21 Infantry Division in the inspection, the specially dressed in camouflage fatigues.
sentences.chinese: 李明博在视察第21步兵师团时，还特地身着迷彩服。

definition: painted ornament/livery (on airline or company vehicle)
